briefTitle: Study Comparing Effectiveness of Intraperitoneal Insulin Administration to Subcutaneous Insulin Administration
officialTitle: A Randomized, Active Control, Multi-Center Study Comparing the Effect of Intraperitoneal Insulin Administration to Subcutaneous Insulin Administration on Glycemic Control and the Frequency of Severe Hypoglycemia

interventions.name: Medtronic MiniMed Implantable Pump Human Recombinant Insulin

summary: The purpose of this study is to evaluate the effectiveness of insulin delivered in the peritoneum (abdomen)by an implantable pump in Type 1 diabetics.

primaryOutcome.measure: Change in HbA1c and Compared Between Groups
